alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Meade; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 3:46PM MDT until September 04 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Harding County in northwestern South Dakota... Northeastern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... North central Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southwestern Perkins County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 346 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dears Ears Butte, or 40 miles northeast of Belle Fourche, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Zeona around 405 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
